reviews.sentence: Most consistently high service we have experienced. We experienced the most consistently excellent service of any hotel we remember. Every member of the staff front desk bartender dining room was very talkative friendly and helpful. Even two members of the pool cleaning staff were as nice and service oriented as those in positions where that is expected. It was an excellent choice for a New Years staycation with roomy room indoor pool great breakfast and not watered down drinks at the managers reception.

Overall satisfaction not satisfied. I was not happy. I was referred here by a friend but not at this location. My partner and I was looking to enjoy this stay by visiting the pool hot tub and gym. The pool was having trouble so we did not get to enjoy that or the hot tub. The gym was excellent. We had food delivered room service but was over charged. They said they would remove it from my card and gave me a gift card which was nice but they still charged my card. I called to inform them but it is still on my card. The room was very clean and nice but we were miserable because it was really hot. We adjusted the temperature but it was still hot and we ended up sleeping in the living room me on the couch and my partner on the floor.

Nice stay. We enjoyed the pool and the new free snacks from the snack machines behind the elevators. Nice upgrade especially when the kids get hungry after swimming. I stay at Embassy Suites as much as possible. This one was not the newest but it was nice. The location was perfect for what we needed it for which was going to the mall in Alphareta.
We had alot of ants in our room but other than that it was a wonderful stay. The breakfast was very good nice pool and friendly staff.

Great Place to bring the family. We enjoyed our stay very much with our family. The only negative is the broken elevator that has been broken for months. We feel since there was only one elevator to serve a six floor hotel that this situation was a significant security and liability risk. We hope that this risk will be repaired and resolved. We loved the indoor heated pool the nightly managers reception and the hot breakfast cooked to order. Great location. Many restaurants shops cinemas entertainment are available. See above.

Favorite Hotel. I travel to Alphareta often and this is by far my favorite hotel. Actually this is one of my favorite hotels anywhere. We my family and I were actually travelling to Tennessee from Tampa and left a day early and went a bit out of our way to stay here for the night. I love the staff they are so friendly the room are great and clean the atrium is beautiful great indoor pool and hot tub great gym great location and we also love the breakfast although a bit crowded and busy our last stay and also love the happy hour restaurant. Highly recommend this hotel to anyone. I travel to Alphareta often and this is by far my favorite hotel. Actually this is one of my favorite hotels anywhere. We my family and I were I travel to Alphareta often and this is by far my favorite hotel. Actually this is one of my favorite hotels anywhere. We my family and I were.
Pool breakfast and managers reception.
Perfect as Always. This hotel is awesome. My wedding party snd family stayed for the weekend loved it. From the staff to the pool breakfast free drinks. We will definitely return again.
Wonderful. The facility is homey and welcoming. The heated pool a large benefit. Rooms were comfortable and met our needs. Booking confusion.

The hotel needs some upgrading but was nice and clean. The breakfast was awesome and Ms Lenora needs a RAISE. The staff provided great customer service and made me feel at home. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family. The waterfall in the lobby and the Jacuzi in the poolroom is the icing on the cake. The staff being friendly efficient and yet professional I am willing to pay more for these traits but luckily did not have to. The location was not ideal for me but I came on the recommendation of someone else and have no regrets. I would stay again. The upgrades to the building. Like painting and carpet things were clean but worn.

Loved it. I absolutely loved the staff from the front desk to the eating area. The rooms were very comfortable. The hotel is close to so many main attractions and the value was on point. Def staying again sonThe only thing was the pool. The chlorine was so strong my eyes and nose burned just from sitting in pool area while my kids went swimming.

The good the bad and the ok. The hotel is beautiful doing renovations and it is lovely. Breakfast was amazing cocktail hour was family friendly rooms were very nice and clean. The hotel was quiet even when it was full. The pool not yet renovated. the pool was HOT the hot tub COLD. The temperature in the pool area was sauna like and nothing changed when we complained twice. We had children with us and choose a place with a pool but it was a big disappointment. Ants there were ants in the bathroom. ugh said would sent someone to spray. still there for 4 days.
Great staycation. I loved the breakfast buffet and the cocktail hour. I totally disliked the fact that the pool was unavailable.
It was a decent stay. The room was a good size. The staff was very nice friendly. That we did not know that construction was going on. We wanted to use indoor pool.
It ’s good just that the indoor pool was closed and the hotel was under going construction so there was a lot of big boxes of furniture and plastic covering the lobby.

Decpetive Advertising and No Notice. This was completely deceptive. The hotel was under major construction including the eating area lounge area and pool but there was no mention of that during my booking. I had specifically booked this hotel because of the indoor pool which was prominently displayed on the website. Also there was little to no discount for this condition. I would like a full refund beyond the first night so that we can book another hotel for our family Christmas.

Wonderful Visit. Hotel Room very nice comfortable and newly renovated. Fantastic breakfast selection. Wi Fi was hard to use and no hot tub Jacuzi in pool area. Other than that we had a fantastic weekend stay at this hotel. Will definitely be coming back. Each day we received a text asking about our stay. That has never been done at any hotel I have visited. That was very personable and a nice gesture. Place. Hot tub Jacuzi in pool area. Had to wait 15 20 min. in omelet line because people were ordering 2 3 omelets at a time for family members.

Everything was nice. The room was clean. The service was great. The breakfast was a real one and tasted wonderful. The reason why I give it a 4 is Because the indoor pool was so COLD. It should have had some warmth to it. My girls lips were blue and their skin ice cold after playing for 2 hours. Also they do not have a hot tub for you to at least balance the temperature out. Nevertheless we would stay here again. It was nice and close to shops and restaurants.

Good. Comfortable and friendly staff. Are room was straight across from the elevator so it was noisy. Kids were playing outside our door hitting the wall and playing on the elevator. Common areas and pool kind of dirty.

I enjoyed the managers hour full hot breakfast and the staff were very polite and nice. I did not like the small pool and unsupervised kids in the pool area who were jumping cursing and allowed to use the hotel level I was on as a running trail at all hours of the day and night.

Need to change some things. No jacuzi with the indoor pool n no outdoor pool. Rooms were good parking ok and quiet. I ’m biggest problem that I felt like they seemed like no big deal was breakfast. Bacon was cold n not fresh and same with the potatoes. They have 1 area for buffet n hot food. If you do n’t want omelet they will redirect you half way in buffet line n cut others that have waiting with their omelet to get their hot food. So by the time you get the rest of hot stuff in buffet line your omelet is cold. Also kids not supervised in breakfast area.

Nice building staff food just a few little changes could have made our time here excellent. Room staff breakfast was all good. Parking lot too dark. no spaces open on the side of the building our room was on so I had to worry about my car all night. parking by a sign that says park here at your own risk is not comforting. When your paying 200 for a room and staying in a state your not familiar with it would be nice to feel like your car will still be there in the morning. I also would have liked it if the bar and pool were open til midnight. We arrived after a long drive after 8 pm went out for dinner and by the time we got back around 10 the pool and bar were closed so we were not able to take advantage of the amenities.
4 stars. Not sure if they pool filter actually worked plus a lot of chlorine in the pool but overall a great family outing.

Business and pleasure trip. We stayed for both business and pleasure. The hotel is very nice. We only have three items we wish they would change. 1. Swimming pool room was way too hot and chlorine fumes overpowering. 2. Wish they had a hot tub and 3. Wish they did not limit you to only one happy hour drink at the bar.

3 nite stay. Upon arrival I scrubbed a bad stain off of the carpet removed hair from the bathroom floor and tub. Felt it necessary to totally clean the bathroom because it just seemed unsanitary. There was also a musty type smell in the room. This place is sorry and everything is worn out. After driving 9 hours of driving I was looking forward to a nice swim in the indoor pool. That did n’t happen … the pool water was very very cloudy … did n’t look safe. Somebody named Christopher sent me a text to see if everything was okay with the room and I reiterated what I noted earlier in this review. He personally guaranteed to credit my first night stay 20. THIS NEVER HAPPENED and I really do not care about the aprox 25. My advice … spend a few more bucks and avoid this NASTY place. Hilton should be ashamed.
Wonderful service. An advantage for me is the indoor pool in a cold weather.
